House Bill/Resolution NO. HB07900
FULL TITLE : AN ACT AMENDING SECTION 82 OF REPUBLIC ACT NO. 10963, OTHERWISE KNOWN AS THE TAX REFORM FOR ACCELERATION AND INCLUSION ACT, AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
ABSTRACT : Aims to increase the unconditional cash transfer to Five Hundred Pesos (P500.00) which may be increased, as may be necessary by the President of the Philippines, upon unanimous recommendation of the Secretaries of Finance, Social Welfare and Development, and Budget and Management.
ALIAS NAME : “Unconditional Cash Transfers Act of 2018.”
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : ROMERO, MICHAEL ODYLON L., Ph.D.
DATE FILED : 2018-07-02
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON WAYS AND MEANS ON 2018-07-30
